about_the_game:
Demo and Repeat!
The demo introduces the first level of the game and ale the direction the game has taken over the past year. First of all you will get to know the controls, basic game principles and the environment in which Repeat takes place. The level design will let you explore elements of skateparks, construction sites, minerals and concrete architecture. The final game will contain a total of 9 levels, including an open landscape. Finally, you can check the hardware requirements with the demo and get up to five achievements.



If we hold Dullahan's head, do we also control her body?
No! In the game, we control a physical entity in a special protective suit, but it is not the Dullahan's body. An inflatabe suit, the so-called Bubble suit, is the only way to move efficiently in the world of Repeat. It is designed for falling from great height, jumping, bouncing around, sliding and collecting coins. But above all, thanks to the suit, you can take care of the Dullahan's head.
By the way, her name is Freckle, and you will be travelling together throughout the game.



What else?
Download the demo > Play > Explore and Repeat > Wishlist and Follow

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080

short_description: Repeat is a sci-fi first-person platformer with parkour and puzzle elements. The mysterious head in your hands belongs to an unknown Dullahan and she has the ability to repeat space infinitely. Face to face you try to find a way out of the world around you. How? And when?
